info.name: daylight-surfing-global
info.description:
This is a `negative' clone of the great
style 23516
intended for using from dawn till dusk
info.additionalInfo: almost all of the work for the original style conversion has been done by a few lines of Perl. see Discussion. ------------------------ 2011/06/14 html,body text color changed to pure black 2012/02/15 more background images
